title: Excursion to the bridge of friendship
creator_credit: Puss Puss Productions, Australian Film Commission, New South Wales Film and Television Office, Helen Bowden and Christina Andreef
brief_description: A sophisticated Sydney woman answers a letter from a famous Bulgarian folksinger she doesn’t know in an attempt to build the bridge that will allow a “singing Slav” to break the inner city market of Sydney. A very funny “silent musical”. No dialogue, English subtitles and musical soundtrack.
creator_credit_for_label: Puss Puss Productions, Australian Film Commission, New South Wales Film and Television Office, Helen Bowden and Christina Andreef
